Documentation

About

Composition Toolkit is a source for teaching materials for composition, rhetoric, and literature courses. It is an open source website

CC license

Getting started with GitHub

Online

View our repository on GitHub

This site has emerged out of a project of the Department of English at the University of Victoria to test the use of on-line teaching tools in the first-year classroom. The site itself was designed by Alex Christie, whose work was funded by a grant from the University of Victoria's Learning and Teaching Centre.
